name: U.S. Web Design System (USWDS) UI Design Kit
description:
UI Design Kit for the U.S. Web Design System (USWDS) based on the USWDS Adobe XD files.


FAQ:


Does the USWDS team offer a Figma kit?


No, the USWDS team does not plan to provide any Figma support for the foreseeable future b/c Figma is not ATOâ€™d by GSA which the team is housed in. So it would have to be community-maintained for the time being.


USWDS website: https://designsystem.digital.gov/


Another excellent fork of this: https://www.figma.com/community/file/836611771720754351
